failed.fetch_server: Failed to fetch download server list
failed.test_server: Failed to connect to download server

validate.name_2: Name must be at least 2 characters
validate.name_40: Name must be less than 40 characters
validate.url_http: URL must start with http or https
validate.api_invalid: Please enter a valid API URL
validate.api_http: API URL must start with http or https
validate.api_slash: API URL must not end with /

anime.empty: Please add a RSS subscription first.

download.empty_server: Please add a download server first.
download.empty_torrents: No torrents found in all download servers
download.alert: This action will delete the task from the download server, but the downloaded files will not be deleted.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Choose how Nyaatify looks to you.

language.title: Language
language.description: This is the language of Nyaatify. This setting is saved in your browser.

sv_state.title: Show Download Server State
sv_state.description: Show the state of download server on anime page, such as no download server or download server offline.

title_priority.title: Title Priority
title_priority.description: The anime title will be displayed in the order of the selected language.

cover_source.title: Cover Source
cover_source.description: Choose your favorite anime cover: Bangumi uses standard covers, Anilist removes the anime title from the cover.

add.title: Add a New RSS Subscription
add.description: Add a Nyaa or Mikan RSS subscription to track anime publication. It may take a few minutes to parse all anime data.
add.name: Name

list.title: RSS Subscription List
list.empty: Please add a RSS subscription first.
list.alert: This action will delete this RSS subscription permanently. The anime included in this RSS will also be DELETED.

ai.title: AI Parsing
ai.description: When parsing titles, prioritize utilizing AI to accurately extract anime titles. The selected model should be compatible with OpenAI interfaces, such as ChatGPT, Gemini, DeepSeek, Kimi, etc. To ensure accuracy, try not to use the lowest grade Lite model. Each parsing consumes approximately 200 tokens.

add.title: Add a New Download Server
add.description: Add a download server to manage your download tasks.
add.name: Name
add.type_notice_qb: Notice: qBittorrent minimum compatible version is 4.1.0
add.type_notice_tr: Notice: Transmission minimum compatible version is 1.0
add.type_notice_ar: Notice: Aria2 minimum compatible version is 1.0

list.title: Download Servers List
list.empty: Please add a download server first.
list.alert: This action will delete this download server permanently.

default.title: Default Download Server
default.description: When creating download tasks, Nyaatify will prioritize downloading through this server.

add.title: Add a New Notification
add.description: Add a notification service to receive message pushes when conditions are triggered.
add.name: Name
add.filter_notice_rss: Enter the RSS subscription name to receive notifications only for new anime releases from this subscription. For multiple subscriptions, separate them with commas. Leave it blank to receive all notifications.
add.filter_notice_download: Enter the download server name to receive notifications only for completed downloads from this server. For multiple servers, separate them with commas. Leave it blank to receive all notifications.
add.extra_notice: After adding extra parameters, they will be sent together in the POST request, separated by “&”.

list.title: Notification List
list.empty: Please add a notification service first.
list.alert: This action will delete this notification service permanently.

version.title: Version
version.description: Check the running version of Nyaatify.

404.title: 404 Page Not Found
404.description: The page you are looking for does not exists.
